sentences.en: Combine the beans, chopped mint and olive oil in a large bowl.
sentences.cn: 将菜豆、切碎的薄荷和橄榄油放在大碗里搅拌。

sentences.en: Empty the noodles and liquid into a serving bowl.
sentences.cn: 把汤面倒进上菜用的碗中。

sentences.en: Everyone wanted to bowl, hence everyone wanted to open a bowling alley.
sentences.cn: 大家都想玩保龄球，因此大家都想开保龄球馆。

sentences.en: Fill a bowl with water and gently sponge your face and body.
sentences.cn: 在一只盆里放上水，轻轻地用蘸湿的海绵擦拭你的面部及身体。

sentences.en: He said earlier that he is not holding out a begging bowl.
sentences.cn: 他早先说他不会伸手去乞求援助。

sentences.en: He smacked the bowl of his pipe into his hand.
sentences.cn: 他在自己手上磕打烟斗。

sentences.en: In a separate bowl, whisk together the remaining sugar and the yolks.
sentences.cn: 用另外一只碗把剩下的糖和蛋黄搅打均匀。

sentences.en: It felt just like old times, to bowl down Knightsbridge.
sentences.cn: 驱车在奈茨布里奇大街上疾驰而过，感觉就好像回到了过去。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, melt the white chocolate in a bowl suspended over simmering water.
sentences.cn: 同时，把碗置于微沸的水上，将白巧克力放入碗中使其熔化。

sentences.en: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly in a large bowl.
sentences.cn: 将所有配料放在大碗里搅拌均匀。

sentences.en: Mix the ingredients for the dressing in a bowl.
sentences.cn: 在碗里将各种原料混成调料。

sentences.en: Place them in a jam jar, porcelain bowl, or other similar container.
sentences.cn: 将它们装入果酱罐、瓷碗或其他类似容器中。

sentences.en: Remove the bowl from the ice and stir in the cream.
sentences.cn: 从冰里把碗取出，搅入奶油。

sentences.en: Sift the flour and baking powder into a medium-sized mixing bowl.
sentences.cn: 将面粉和发酵粉筛入中等大小的搅拌碗中。

sentences.en: Smear a little olive oil over the inside of the salad bowl.
sentences.cn: 在色拉碗的内壁上抹一点橄榄油。

sentences.en: Tip the vegetables into a bowl.

words.tran_cn: 圆顶礼帽；投球手；玩滚球的人
玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动
投球；旋转；平稳快速移动

phrases.tran_cn: 使出局，打败：因投球击落柱上横木而迫使（板球以中的击球员）退场
打倒：给…造成一个强烈的印象；压倒
金鱼缸（无法躲开众人耳目的地方）
搅拌钵；混料罐；[美俚]公路交叉点
玫瑰杯美式足球赛（在美国加州帕沙第纳举行）
美国橄榄球超级杯大赛

trans.tran_cn: 碗，盆，碗状部分，一碗之量，木球，环形剧场，杯赛
trans.tran_en: a wide round container that is open at the top, used to hold liquids, food, flowers etc
a wide round container that is open at the top, used to hold liquids, food, flowers etc

trans.tran_cn: 玩保龄球，投球，快速行驶
trans.tran_en: to travel along very quickly and smoothly
